title: Rise and Fall
lyrics:
[chorus]
Some(Bm)times in life you (F#m)feel the fight is (Em)over ((F#)over)
And it (Bm)seems as though the (F#m)writings on the (Em)wall (ye(F#)ah) 
Super(Bm)star you finally (F#m)made it
But once your (Em)picture becomes (F#)tainted
It's what they (Bm)call (F#m)
The rise and (Em)fall (F#)
 
(Bm) I always (F#m)said that I was gonna ma-(Em)-ake it
Now it's (F#)plain for everyone to (Bm)see
But this (F#m)game I'm in don't take no pri-(Em)-isoners
Just (F#)casualties
(Bm) I know that (F#m)everything is gonna (Em)change
Even the (F#)friends I knew before me go
(G) But this dream (F#m) is the life (Em) I've been se-(F#)-earching for
 
(Bm) Started be(F#m)lieving that I was the (Em)greatest
My life was (F#)never gonna be the same
(Bm) Cause with the (F#m)money came a different sta-(Em)-atus
That's (F#)when things change
(Bm) Now I'm too con(F#m)cerned with all the things I (Em)own
Blinded by (F#)all the pretty girls I see
(G) I'm begi-(F#m)-inning to (Em)lose my inte-(F#)-egrity (Straight in)
 
[chorus]
Some(Bm)times in life you (F#m)feel the fight is (Em)over ((F#)over)
And it (Bm)seems as though the (F#m)writings on the (Em)wall (ye(F#)ah) 
Super(Bm)star you finally (F#m)made it
But once your (Em)picture becomes (F#)tainted
It's what they (Bm)call (F#m)
The rise and (Em)fall (F#)
 
(Bm) I never (F#m)used to be a troublema-(Em)-aker
Now I don't (F#)even wanna please the fans
(Bm) No auto(F#m)graphs, no interviews, no pi-(Em)-ictures
And (F#)less demands
(Bm) Given ad(F#m)vice that was clearly (Em)wrong
The type that (F#)seems to make me feel so right
(Bm) But some things (F#m) you may find (Em) can take o-(F#)-over your life
 
(Bm) Burnt all my (F#m)bridges now I've run out of pla-(Em)-aces
And there's (F#)nowhere left for me to turn
(Bm) Been caught in (F#m)compromising situa-(Em)-ations
I should (F#) have learnt
(Bm) From all those (F#m)times I didn't walk awa-(Em)-ay
When I (F#)knew that it was best to go
(Bm) Is it too (F#m) late to show (Em) you the (F#)shape of my heart [straight in chorus]
 
[chorus]
Some(Bm)times in life you (F#m)feel the fight is (Em)over ((F#)over)
And it (Bm)seems as though the (F#m)writings on the (Em)wall (ye(F#)ah) 
Super(Bm)star you finally (F#m)made it
But once your (Em)picture becomes (F#)tainted
It's what they (Bm)call (F#m)
The rise and (Em)fall (F#)
 
[bridge]
(G) Now I know
(F#m) I made mistakes
(Em7) Think I don't care
But you (Asus4)don't... realise what this means to me
(G)So let me have
Just (F#m)one more chance
I'm (Em7)not the man I used to (Asus4-stop)be
Used to beeeeeeeeeee (Straight in)
 
[chorus]
Some(Cm)times in life you (Gm)feel the fight is (Fm)over ((G)over)
And it (Cm)seems as though the (Gm)writings on the (Fm)wall (ye(G)ah) 
Super(Cm)star you finally (Gm)made it
But once your (Fm)picture becomes (G)tainted
It's what they (Cm)call (Gm)
The rise and (Fm)fall (G)
 
[chorus again!]
Some(Cm)times in life you (Gm)feel the fight is (Fm)over ((G)over)
And it (Cm)seems as though the (Gm)writings on the (Fm)wall (ye(G)ah) 
Super(Cm)star you finally (Gm)made it
But once your (Fm)picture becomes (G)tainted
It's what they (Cm)call (Gm)
The rise and (Fm)fall (G)
The rise and (Cm)fall [end]
